statements: SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE violation_type='Robbery';
SELECT case_title, accused_party FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_description, court_location FROM court_cases WHERE verdict='Guilty';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE court_location='New York' ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT case_title, hearing_date FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hearing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE verdict = 'Guilty';
SELECT case_title, violation_type, court_location FROM court_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_title, hearing_date FROM court_cases WHERE accused_party LIKE '%Smith%' AND verdict != 'Not Guilty';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT violation_type) AS total_violations, MAX(filing_date) AS latest_filing_date FROM court_cases;
SELECT accused_party, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM court_cases GROUP BY accused_party HAVING total_cases > 1 ORDER BY total_cases DESC, accused_party ASC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations;
SELECT case_name, violation_type FROM human_rights_violations WHERE location = 'Syria';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT case_name, location FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Murder' AND location = 'Iraq' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT analyst_name, analysis_date FROM legal_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM human_rights_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Torture';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_violations WHERE location = 'Syria' ORDER BY date_occurred DESC;
SELECT case_name, violation_type, location FROM human_rights_violations WHERE date_occurred BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis_id, analyst_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM legal_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT hr.case_id, hr.case_name, la.analyst_name FROM human_rights_violations hr INNER JOIN legal_analysis la ON hr.case_id = la.case_id WHERE hr.location = 'Myanmar';
SELECT * FROM CourtCases;
SELECT case_name, violation_type FROM CourtCases WHERE court_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT plaintiff_name, age, nationality FROM Plaintiffs WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT defendant_name, organization FROM Defendants ORDER BY defendant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourtCases WHERE violation_type LIKE '%traffic%';
SELECT * FROM CourtCases WHERE violation_type = 'Traffic Violation';
SELECT case_name, court_date FROM CourtCases WHERE court_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plaintiff_name, nationality, age, CourtCases.case_name FROM Plaintiffs INNER JOIN CourtCases ON Plaintiffs.case_id = CourtCases.case_id WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT defendant_name, organization FROM Defendants ORDER BY defendant_name DESC;

SELECT CourtCases.case_name, Plaintiffs.plaintiff_name, Defendants.defendant_name FROM CourtCases INNER JOIN Plaintiffs ON CourtCases.case_id = Plaintiffs.case_id INNER JOIN Defendants ON CourtCases.case_id = Defendants.case_id;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsCases;
SELECT case_name, violation_type, country_code FROM HumanRightsCases ORDER BY date_filed DESC;
SELECT defendant_name, age, gender FROM Defendants WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT lawyer_name, specialty, years_practiced FROM Lawyers WHERE fee > 5000;
SELECT judge_name, outcome FROM Proceedings WHERE proceeding_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY proceeding_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HumanRightsCases ORDER BY date_filed DESC, case_name ASC;
SELECT case_name, violation_type, country_code FROM HumanRightsCases WHERE violation_type = 'Torture' ORDER BY case_name;
SELECT defendant_name, age, gender, nationality FROM Defendants JOIN HumanRightsCases ON Defendants.case_id = HumanRightsCases.case_id WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT lawyer_name, specialty, years_practiced FROM Lawyers WHERE fee > 5000 ORDER BY years_practiced DESC;
SELECT judge_name, outcome FROM Proceedings JOIN HumanRightsCases ON Proceedings.case_id = HumanRightsCases.case_id WHERE date_filed >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM court_cases WHERE case_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT victim_name, victim_age, victim_gender FROM victims WHERE victim_age > 18;
SELECT defendant_name, defendant_role FROM defendants ORDER BY defendant_role DESC;
SELECT ruling_text, ruling_date FROM rulings WHERE ruling_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date, case_status FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';

SELECT defendants.defendant_name, victims.victim_name, court_cases.case_name FROM defendants INNER JOIN victims ON defendants.case_id = victims.case_id INNER JOIN court_cases ON defendants.case_id = court_cases.case_id;
SELECT case_name, COUNT(defendant_id) AS num_defendants FROM court_cases LEFT JOIN defendants ON court_cases.case_id = defendants.case_id GROUP BY case_name;
SELECT defendants.defendant_name, evidence.evidence_details FROM defendants LEFT JOIN evidence ON defendants.case_id = evidence.case_id;
